data.name: Twilight Town: A Cyberpunk Day In Life
data.detailed_description:
You play as Ikuro, a gambling addict looking to fuel his other addiction to his personalized A.I robot wife, Sei. There's a problem though. Sei needs memory components, but of course, getting the money for that is easier said then done, so expect to encounter some shady and unsavory individuals on your way...

  • Relaxing, Immersive OST!
  • Gorgeous, animated backgrounds and sprites!
  • Gripping, dark narrative!
  • Colorful and well written characters!
data.about_the_game:
You play as Ikuro, a gambling addict looking to fuel his other addiction to his personalized A.I robot wife, Sei. There's a problem though. Sei needs memory components, but of course, getting the money for that is easier said then done, so expect to encounter some shady and unsavory individuals on your way...

  • Relaxing, Immersive OST!
  • Gorgeous, animated backgrounds and sprites!
  • Gripping, dark narrative!
  • Colorful and well written characters!
data.short_description: Twilight Town: A Cyberpunk Day In Life is a chill, linear visual novel set in an ambient yet melancholic town in the distant future. Play as Ikuro and work with all kinds of shady figures to take care of your personal robot companion you're so hopelessly in love with.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
